name: Survive the Island (itch) (MurphysDad, Scrapy Ninja, 00Her0, immortalicecream)
name_original: Survive the Island (itch) (MurphysDad, Scrapy Ninja, 00Her0, immortalicecream)
description:
Collect ship parts to get the highest score! Survive the elements!

W, A, D - Movement
LMB - Place Block
RMB - Pickip Block
Mouse Wheel - Switch block types
